Black and Blue Skull Fingerless Gloves
â€“ CapstoneFPT

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Helping to keep your hands snug in all their stripey glory, these fingerless gloves are available in a variety of different colours, and skull types (hence forth known as Pirate Skull, Cheery Skull and Mutant skull). This one is Cheery Skull. Isn't he sweet? Don't you want to take him home? >^-^< Uni-sex, one siz

childNodes.textContent: Black and Blue Skull Fingerless Gloves

Helping to keep your hands snug in all their stripey glory, these fingerless gloves are available in a variety of different colours, and skull types (hence forth known as Pirate Skull, Cheery Skull and Mutant skull). This one is Cheery Skull. Isn't he sweet? Don't you want to take him home? >^-^<

Uni-sex, one size fits all. Also available in elbow length.
